exception_SUSPENDED_USER.en: Your account has been suspended. Please contact example@email.org for further assistance.

exception_ATTRIBUTE_WRONG_FORMAT.en: attrauthcomanage configuration error: '%REQATTR%' wrong format(array required)

exception_ATTRIBUTE_KEY_CONFIGURATION_ER.en: attrauthcomanage configuration error: '%REQATTR%' key configuration error. Required keys missing: %NONKEYS%

exception_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_BOOLEAN.en: attrauthcomanage configuration error: %OPTATTR% not a boolean

exception_description.en: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving attributes from an external attribute authority. The exception was:
